titles.title: To authorize Federal payment to emergency ambulance and medical services providers for the cost of uncompensated care of aliens aided by the border patrol or other Federal immigration officials.
Pay for All Your Undocumented Procedures (PAY UP!) Act of 2007
Pay for All Your Undocumented Procedures (PAY UP!) Act of 2007

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary: Pay for All Your Undocumented Procedures (PAY UP!) Act of 2007 - Directs the Secretary of Homeland Security to pay emergency ambulance and medical service providers for the cost of uncompensated care of aliens aided by a border patrol officer or other federal immigration official.
